name: Dankest Dungeon
description:
Dankest Dungeon is a 2D platformer made for GBJAM5.

Control Spoopy the skull as he tries to find his trousers (spoiler you never find them there wasn't time to draw some long johns).

Sorry Mac users, just realised keybindings are different on OSX. We'll do a controller working Mac + OpenGL build tomorrow :)

Controls

=============

Keyboard:

N - Jump

Arrows - Move

P - Swap to GB vision (it's an easter egg, I know you're only allow 4 colours)

Controller: (might be wrong on macs)

A - Jump

Dpad/Left Analogue - Move

=============
